Detailed Description

template<typename _Kty, typename _Ty, typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
class Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >

A generic cache proxy.

This generic cache is a proxy for some sort of dataset. The cache provides a method for accessing the values in the dataset using a key whose form is completely determined by the user. The cache is a write-back cache and uses fully associative mapping.

The cache also provides support methods: a method to flush a value, a method to prevent an value from being flushed, and a method that pre-fetches an value from the dataset. Pre-fetch is asynchronous (in contrast the normal accessor, which blocks until the value is in the cache).

Parameters
_KtyType of the key used to reference a value in the cache.
_TyType of value contained in the cache
_PrFunctor used to sort the values in the cache. Default: std::less< _Kty >
_AllocFunctor used by the cache's container to allocate container nodes. Default: std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >
Note
This class is an abstract base class. The following methods must be overridden:
  • Cache<>::Read
  • Cache<>::Write
  • Cache<>::IsFull
  • Cache<>::Condemn
  • Cache<>::AsyncRead
  • Cache<>::WaitForAsyncRead

template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Clear ( )
inline

Discards all values in the cache.

Any values that are "dirty" are written back to the dataset first.

template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Discard ( Key const &  key)
inline

Discards a value from the cache.

If the value is "dirty", it is written back first. If the value is not in the cache, nothing happens.

Parameters
keyThe value to discard
template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Flush ( Key const &  key)
inline

Flushes a value in the cache.

This function writes out a value if it has been changed. The value remains in the cache after being flushed.

Parameters
keyThe value to flush
Note
If the value is not in the cache, it is loaded into the cache first.
If the value does not exist, it is created.
template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Invalidate ( Key const &  key)
inline

Marks an value as dirty.

A dirty value is written back to the dataset when it is discarded from the cache.

Parameters
keyThe value to mark
Note
If the value does not exist, it is created.

template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Lock ( Key const &  key,
bool  lock = true 
)
inline

Locks a value in the cache.

This function prevents an value from being discarded from the cache before any unlocked values. It does not guarantee that the value will never be discarded from the cache.

Parameters
keyThe value to lock
lockThe new lock setting. Default: true
Note
If the value is not in the cache, it is loaded into the cache first.
If the value does not exist, it is created.
template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
Value& Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::operator[] ( Key const &  key)
inline

Accesses a value in the dataset through the cache.

If the value is not in the cache, it is loaded into the cache first.

Parameters
keyThe value to access
Note
If the value does not exist, it is created.
template<typename _Kty , typename _Ty , typename _Pr = std::less< _Kty >, typename _Alloc = std::allocator< std::pair< _Kty const, _Cache_element< _Ty > > >>
void Cache< _Kty, _Ty, _Pr, _Alloc >::Prefetch ( Key const &  key)
inline

Prefetches a value.

This function loads an value into the cache asynchronously. Normally, if a value is not in the cache, it is loaded when it is accessed, and the accessor waits until the value is loaded before continuing.

Parameters
keyThe value to prefetch
